name: 3DTicTacToe
description: This is my final project for my graphics application classes. Over 4 weeks, this game has developed into a 3D tic-tac-toe with the option of single player or multiplayer and the choice of which player goes first for both playing modes. Single player has an AI that will play against you and attempt to win. All models are made through javascript and Three.js, no actual art has been used.
